unnormalised: Entertainment News: Music Streaming – Are We There Yet, Yaar?
normalised: Entertainment News: Music Streaming – Are We There Yet, Friend?

unnormalised: Mumbai – Is your data bill weeping silent Bollywood tears again? Blame it on music streaming! New reports suggest desi music lovers are bumping up data consumption faster than Rajinikanth can dodge bullets.
normalised: Mumbai – Is your data bill weeping silent Bollywood tears again? Blame it on music streaming! New reports suggest desi music lovers are bumping up data consumption faster than Rajinikanth can dodge bullets.

unnormalised: Researchers at IIT Delhi found the average millennial now streams 3 hours of Punjabi pop a day. Three HOURS! What happened to actual work, beta?
normalised: Researchers at I I T Delhi found the average millennial now streams three hours of Punjabi pop a day. Three HOURS! What happened to actual work, child?

unnormalised: Industry analyst, Rohan Kapoor, quipped, "It's like everyone's living in a Dharma Productions film montage, complete with background score, 24/7."
normalised: Industry analyst, Rohan Kapoor, quipped, "It's like everyone's living in a Dharma Productions film montage, complete with background score, twenty four slash seven."

unnormalised: Streaming giants like Gaana and JioSaavn are battling it out for listener's attention (and data packs), offering everything from devotional bhajans to Yo Yo Honey Singh’s latest banger.
normalised: Streaming giants like Gaana and JioSaavn are battling it out for listener's attention (and data packs), offering everything from devotional bhajans to Yo Yo Honey Singh’s latest banger.

unnormalised: The big question is, are artists getting a fair shake? Some claim they’re earning peanuts (Rs. 5000 a month!) while the platforms rake in crores. Ouch!
normalised: The big question is, are artists getting a fair shake? Some claim they’re earning peanuts (rupees five thousand a month!) while the platforms rake in crores. Ouch!

unnormalised: So, stream responsibly, people! Your wallet (and your productivity) will thank you. Maybe listen to just one hour of "Lungi Dance" today. Just maybe.
normalised: So, stream responsibly, people! Your wallet (and your productivity) will thank you. Maybe listen to just one hour of "Lungi Dance" today. Just maybe.
